turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: im sorry i hear a lot of background noise can you repeat your order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to recommend some seasonal specials at starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, they have a black and white mocha, a caramel brulee latte, and eggnog latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do any of those sound good?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which one would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: im sorry can you repeat that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want one of the seasonal offerings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, some seasonal specialties are black and white mocha, caramel brulee latte, and eggnog latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did you want any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did you want to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your grande black and white mocha will be ready for pickup in 5 minutes at westlake shopping center, daly city.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you shortly.
